Projects.name: Text Adventure Game
Projects.description: A text adventure game with sound and scoreboard using Java Swing for elementary students. Users need to choose correct answers based on the questions before they lose all their HP.

Projects.name: uBot
Projects.img_description: This is the robot we built.
Projects.description: Lead a group of 5 to build a robot that can sweep, vacuum, and mop atthe same time, and can be controled by a IR remoter. DC motors,ultrasonic sensors, IR sensors, 5V batteries and arduino were used in this project.
